p: The estimated rate of mild infections per 100 persons in the nine select countries was highest in Italy at 60.5 and lowest in Pakistan at 27.0 ( Fig 4A). Across world regions, the median per 100 persons was 17.0 (range: 0.25–52.5) in AFRO, 39.0 (range: 1.5–55.0) in EMRO, 41.0 (range: 23.0–54.5) in SEARO, 43.5 in AMRO (range: 29.0–56.5), 51.5 (range: 27.0–61.5) in WPRO, and 56.5 (range: 25.0–65.0) in EURO, and 41.0 (range: 0.25–61.5) globally.
